title: The Legend of Mark Twain
creator_credit: Karl Genus, Daniel Wilson, Benchmark Films and Jules Power Productions
brief_description: Follows Samuel Clemens’ life and career on the American literary scene and dramatises selections from two of his well-known classics - “The Celebrated jumping frog of Calaveras County” and “The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn”. Cast includes David Wayne.
